name: A.B. Original
description: '''A.B. Original''' is an Australian hip hop duo made up of Indigenous Australian rappers [[Briggs (rapper)|Briggs]] and record producer [[Trials (musician)|Trials]]. A.B. Original stands for Always Black, Original. Both members are [[Indigenous Australians]]; Briggs is a [[Yorta Yorta]] man and Trials is [[Ngarrindjeri]]. Their music is overtly political and has been described as "angry, polemical, brutally frank and meant to inspire a response, good or bad".
